message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose an initial offer of $950,000 for the product. This price reflects not only the cost of production and market valuation but also the unique benefits it offers to you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I recognize the value of your product, but the price point is a bit high for me at the moment.  I'd be willing to consider a purchase at $700,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to engage in this discussion. After careful consideration, I would like to make a counteroffer of $850,000 for the product. This price takes into account your valuation and budgetary constraints while still reflecting the product's value and my desire to make a sale. I am confident that this offer will be more acceptable to you and bring us closer to reaching an agreement.

I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  To be completely transparent, my absolute maximum budget for this is $800,000. If you're able to meet that, I'm ready to finalize the deal today.
